revised_title: Determination of the Force of Fired Gunpowder and Initial Velocities of Cannon Balls
tldr: The author, Charles Hutton, conducts experiments to determine the force of fired gunpowder and the initial velocities of cannon balls. He uses a ballistic pendulum to measure the velocity of the balls and investigates the relationship between the initial velocity, weight of the shot, and quantity of powder. This research is crucial for understanding the effects of gunpowder and the flight of projectiles in military applications.
